name: Kirby's breakout: fangame
description:
All rights reserved to Nintendo.

Play as a little cloud and help Kirby in this breakout fangame! Be careful, as the wall of remaining bricks gets lower as you play.

Available powerups : touch the star to go faster, or the candy to go slower! Falling Kirby gives you more balls (up to four). A little cloud can lengthen your paddle.

Play with mouse (press 'r' to restart).

My first game ever! Made with Pygame Zero, and up to changes. Let me know what you think :D

Music from: SketchyLogic (OpenGameArt)

Sounds from: Super Smash Bros. Brawl (Wii),  phoenix1291 (OpenGameArt), celestialghost8 (OpenGameArt)

Assets from: Nintendo, Photon Storm,  FieryExplosion (The Spriters Resource),  A.J. Nitro  (The Spriters Resource)
